title: Cottage Cheese Protein Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes made with oats and cottage cheese for a delicious protein-packed start to your day.
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Cook on nonstick skillet until bubbles form, then flip.
Serve warm with fresh fruit.

title: Salmon Avocado Bowl
description: A nourishing bowl with grilled salmon, brown rice, and creamy avocado slices.
instructions: Grill salmon until flaky.
Assemble rice bowl with salmon, avocado, and veggies.
Drizzle with dressing of choice.

title: Strawberry Basil Coconut Bars
description: A refreshing raw bar made with coconut, strawberries, and a subtle herbal kick from fresh basil. Full of fiber and skin-loving antioxidants.
instructions: Blend all ingredients into a thick paste.
Press into a lined pan.
Chill for 2+ hours before slicing.

title: Grilled Chicken Quinoa Bowl
description: A hearty bowl packed with grilled chicken, quinoa, spinach, and a zesty lemon-tahini dressing.
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Grill chicken breasts until cooked through.
Mix tahini with lemon juice to make dressing.
Assemble bowl with quinoa, sliced chicken, spinach, and dressing.

title: Chocolate Quinoa Crunch Cups
description: Crunchy puffed quinoa cups coated in dark chocolate and topped with a tahini-lemon drizzle.
instructions: Melt chocolate and stir in puffed quinoa.
Spoon mixture into mini muffin liners.
Mix tahini with lemon zest and drizzle on top.
Chill until set.

title: Tofu Veggie Stir Fry
description: A protein-rich stir fry with tofu, colorful veggies, and a light soy-ginger sauce.
instructions: Cube and pan-fry tofu until golden.
Add chopped vegetables and sauté.
Mix soy sauce and ginger and pour over stir fry.
Cook until vegetables are tender.

title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: Layered Greek yogurt, berries, and granola — easy, high-protein breakfast or snack.
instructions: Layer yogurt, berries, and granola in a glass or bowl.
Drizzle with honey if desired.

title: Egg White Veggie Omelette
description: Fluffy egg whites with spinach, tomatoes, and mushrooms for a low-fat, high-protein breakfast.
instructions: Whisk egg whites and season with salt and pepper.
Pour into heated nonstick skillet.
Add veggies and cook until set.
Fold and serve.

title: Lentil Chickpea Salad
description: A cold salad packed with plant protein from lentils and chickpeas, tossed in a lemon vinaigrette.
instructions: Combine lentils, chickpeas, cucumber, and onion.
Mix olive oil and lemon juice to make dressing.
Toss salad with dressing and chill before serving.

title: Ginger Tofu Chocolate Mousse
description: Creamy chocolate mousse made with protein-rich silken tofu, fresh ginger, and cocoa. A gut-friendly, anti-inflammatory treat.
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Spoon into serving cups.
Chill for at least 1 hour.

title: Coconut Yogurt Berry Bites
description: Frozen bites of coconut yogurt with berries and a sprinkle of granola. Packed with probiotics and antioxidants for glowing skin.
instructions: Spoon yogurt into mini silicone molds.
Top with berries and granola.
Freeze until solid.

title: Coconut Meringue Clouds
description: Light and airy meringue cookies with a coconut twist. Naturally low in calories and sugar-free if using monk fruit or stevia.
instructions: Whip egg whites with cream of tartar until foamy.
Gradually add sweetener and vanilla; beat to stiff peaks.
Fold in coconut. Pipe onto baking sheet.
Bake at 225°F for 1 hour. Cool in oven.

title: Lemon Chickpea Blondies
description: Moist, fudgy blondies made with chickpeas, almond flour, and lemon zest. Naturally gluten-free and protein-packed.
instructions: Blend all ingredients into a thick batter.
Spread into lined baking dish.
Bake at 350°F for 20 mins.

title: Banana Oat Protein Cakes
description: Mini pancake-style cakes made with banana, oats, and vanilla protein — soft, sweet, and nourishing for your skin and energy levels.
instructions: Blend all ingredients into batter.
Spoon onto nonstick skillet and cook 2-3 mins per side.
Serve plain or with a drizzle of almond butter.
